item.description:
Fun/moderate Sunday morning run. We'll do a 5.5 mile out/loop/back to Fresh Pond.
Here's a map of the planned run:
http://www.mapmyrun.c...

I usually run about 8:30/mile but everyone is welcome and we can split up into smaller groups if it works out better that way. Whoever wants to grab some breakfast afterwards can go to Bruegger's when we're done.
Hope to see you tomorrow!
PLEASE TRY YOUR BEST TO ARRIVE ON TIME; WE'LL BE LEAVING JUST A FEW MINUTES AFTER 9 AND DON'T WANT TO MISS YOU!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a green kickball cut-off t-shirt and black running shorts

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Sunday morning Porter Square/ run
